title: Buy glitch and mastery token not coming in
body:
Ok so I went into a game and i won the game i got S- and my level 5 mastery badge so yeah I got S- so it should give me level 6 mastery token but it didn't i tried waiting didn't work i tried logging out then back in it also didn't work which it should have came in anyway here is the game : http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/151996614/31633575?tab=overview

Also yesterday i brought x2 **Greater Mark Of Attack Damage** it took my IP but it didn't give me the Mark Of ATT DMG

replies.body:
This is something better submitted in a support ticket (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as we cannot help you with account related issues here on boards. Just sign in an pick the categories that make the most sense for your issue and someone should get back to you within a couple days. 

Please do be aware though that support is hella busy atm so it may take them a little longer than usual to get back to you.
